abstract: Joe DiPietro takes a little off the top.
snippet: Joe DiPietro takes a little off the top.
lead_paragraph: SUNDAY'S PUZZLE - The "Crossing" Words Contest of '11 is now over, but you can still e-mail your answers to crossword@nytimes.com until Sunday at 6 p.m. Eastern time. The consensus seems to be that people loved the puzzles, and the meta-challenge was the piece de resistance. Stay tuned for the second part of an interview with constructor extraordinaire Patrick Berry that I will be running shortly after the Monday puzzle goes live.

headline.main: Sunday: Take It From the Top
